snippet: VELObill, a software product that gathers all of the real-time data on your electricity, natural gas and water usage into one smartphone view, took first prize in the people's choice category of the "Apps for Energy" contest.
abstract: VELObill, a software product that gathers all of the real-time data on your electricity, natural gas and water usage into one smartphone view, took first prize in the people's choice category of the "Apps for Energy" contest.

headline.main: The People's Choice: An All-in-One, Mobile Utility Meter
